item.description:
D&D Game Day is a one day event spotlighting a key product release in an exclusive adventure. This year, D&D Game Day spotlights the Neverwinter Campaign Setting with an exclusive adventure entitled Gates of Neverdeath. Hired on as caravan guards to protect precious cargo bound for the city of Neverwinter, the characters are introduced to the intrigues and danger that await in this fabled Forgotten Realms locale. For the first time, players will create their own D&D characters at the event and play in a prelude adventure to the upcoming D&D Encounters season!

What Do I Need to Play?
Just bring your dice and a copy of a Players Handbook, Heroes of the Fallen Lands or Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms . Character sheets and other materials will be provided. At the store, you can pick up your copy of the Neverwinter Campaign Setting if you want additional options for your character. You’ll make a 1st-level character as a part of the D&D Game Day experience, and will be able to continue to play your character in the new D&D Encounters season, the Lost Crown of Neverwinter!


Due to some scheduling restraints, we're going to delay the start of the next season of Encounters by one week in order to facilitate running this first.  Those of you going to Gen Con will have the opportunity to play it there on Saturday the 6th (and you might see Dale and I as well as a few other members of our gaming group).  For the rest, we'll be running it on the 10th.  This adventure highlights some of the new elements in the Neverwinter Campaign Setting and may offer some advantage in the next season of Encounters to boot!


******************************************************************

Game On is instituting a new policy regarding D&D events held at the store.  Starting with this GameDay and continuing with the next season of Encounters, there is going to be a small admission fee to play.  This money will be used to provide official prize support, something I think we're all happy to have part of our program.  If you have any questions, please contact Pat at the store for more information.
